description:
APM dashboard for monitoring OpenTelemetry-based services.  

Instrument your applications using OpenTelemetry SDKs and send traces, metrics, and logs to Jaeger for traces, a Prometheus-compatible database for metrics, and OpenSearch for logs. This dashboard provides a centralized view of your application's health and performance.

panels.description: Shows the timestamp of the latest metrics received in the past 24h.

targets.expr: timestamp(sum by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (target_info{deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}) or absent{})

panels.title: Latest metrics received

panels.description:
HTTP & RPC endpoints aggregation on the `http.server.request.duration` & `rpc.server.duration` metrics.

See https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/http/http-metrics/#metric-httpserverrequestduration and https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/rpc/rpc-metrics/#metric-rpcserverduration

targets.expr: avg by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_sum[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"})) / avg by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}))

avg by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_sum[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}) / 1000) / avg by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}))

panels.title: Duration

panels.description:
HTTP and RPC endpoints aggregation on the `http.server.request.duration` and `rpc.server.duration` metrics. 

Errors are identified by : 
* `http.response.status_code=~"5.."`
* `rpc.grpc.status_code!="0"`

See https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/http/http-metrics/#metric-httpserverrequestduration

targets.expr:
(
    (sum by(deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"})) * 100) 
    / 
    sum by(deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}))
)
or
(
    0
    * 
    sum by(deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}))
)

((sum by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count{rpc_grpc_status_code!="0"}[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"})) * 100) / sum by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"})))
or
(0 * sum by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"})))

panels.title: Error

panels.description:
HTTP & RPC endpoints aggregation on the `http.server.request.duration` & `rpc.server.duration` metrics.

See https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/http/http-metrics/#metric-httpserverrequestduration

targets.expr: sum by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}))

sum by (deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"})) * $__interval_ms / 1000

panels.title: Request Rate

panels.description:
Inbound HTTP operations of the service (aka HTTP endpoints) based on the `http.server.request.duration` metric.

Errors are identified by `http.response.status_code=~"5.."`.

See https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/http/http-metrics/#metric-httpserverrequestduration

targets.expr: sum by (operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route"))

(sum by (operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count{http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")) / sum by (operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route"))) or (0 * sum by (operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le, operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_server_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", " ", "http_request_method", "http_route")))

panels.title: HTTP Operations

panels.description:
Inbound gRPC operations of the service (aka gRPC endpoints) based on the `rpc.server.request.duration` metric.

Errors are identified by `rpc.grpc.status_code != 0` which make the panel specific to the gRPC protocol.

https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/rpc/rpc-metrics/#metric-rpcserverduration

targets.expr: sum by (operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", "/", "rpc_service", "rpc_method"))

(sum by (operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count{rpc_grpc_status_code!="0"}[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", "/", "rpc_service", "rpc_method")) / sum by (operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", "/", "rpc_service", "rpc_method"))) or (0 * sum by (operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", "/", "rpc_service", "rpc_method")))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le, operation, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_server_duration_milliseconds_bucket[5m]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "operation", "/", "rpc_service", "rpc_method")))

panels.title: gRPC Operations

panels.description:
HTTP calls made by the service based on the `http.client.request.duration` metric.

Calls broken done by remote `server.address` and by `http.request.method`.

See https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/http/http-metrics/#metric-httpclientrequestduration

targets.expr: sum by (outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_client_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", " ", "server_address", "http_request_method", "url_template"))

(sum by (outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_client_request_duration_seconds_count{http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", " ", "server_address", "http_request_method", "url_template")) / sum by (outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_client_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", " ", "server_address", "http_request_method", "url_template"))) or (0 * sum by (outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_client_request_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", " ", "server_address", "http_request_method", "url_template")))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le, outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(http_client_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", " ", "server_address", "http_request_method", "url_template")))

panels.title: Outbound HTTP Services

panels.description:
DB calls made by the service based on the `db.client.operation.duration` metric.

Calls broken down by `server.address` and `db.namespace`.

See https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/database/database-metrics/#metric-dbclientoperationduration

targets.expr: sum by (database, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(db_client_operation_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "database", "/", "server_address", "db_namespace"))

(sum by (database, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(db_client_operation_duration_seconds_count{http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "database", "/", "server_address", "db_namespace")) / sum by (database, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(db_client_operation_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "database", "/", "server_address", "db_namespace"))) or (0 * sum by (database, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(db_client_operation_duration_seconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "database", "/", "server_address", "db_namespace")))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le, database, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(db_client_operation_duration_seconds_bucket[5m]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "database", "/", "server_address", "db_namespace")))

panels.title: Outbound Databases

panels.description:
gRPC calls made by the service based on the `rpc.client.request.duration` metric.

Specific to gRPC due to the usage of the `grpc.status.code` attribute to identify errors.

Calls broken down by `server.address`, `rpc.service`, and `rpc.method`.

See https://opentelemetry.io/docs/specs/semconv/rpc/rpc-metrics/#rpc-client

targets.expr: sum by (outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_client_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", "/", "server_address", "rpc_service", "rpc_method"))

(sum by (outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_client_duration_milliseconds_count{http_response_status_code=~"5.."}[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", "/", "server_address", "rpc_service", "rpc_method")) / sum by (outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_client_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", "/", "server_address", "rpc_service", "rpc_method"))) or (0 * sum by (outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_client_duration_milliseconds_count[$__rate_interval]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", "/", "server_address", "rpc_service", "rpc_method")))

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le, outbound_service, deployment_environment_name, service_namespace, service_name) (label_join(info(rate(rpc_client_duration_milliseconds_bucket[5m]), {deployment_environment_name=~"$deployment_environment_name", service_namespace=~"$service_namespace", service_name="$service_name"}), "outbound_service", "/", "server_address", "rpc_service", "rpc_method")))

panels.title: Outbound gRPC Services

panels.description:
Logs of the service, filtered by `service.name`, `service.namespace`, and `deployment.environment.name`.

To explore the logs, open the menu clicking on the icon `` of this panel and click on `Explore`.

targets.query: search source=otel-logs-* | where resource.service.name="$service_name" and resource.service.namespace="$service_namespace" |fields @timestamp, severity.text, body, instrumentationScope.name

panels.description: Traces containing a span emitted by the service

list.description:
OpenTelemetry metrics. 
Send metrics using the Prometheus OTLP endpoint with `keep_identifying_resource_attributes` enabled. Resource attributes like `service.name`, `service.namespace`, and `deployment.environment.name` are accessed via the experimental `info()` function joining with `target_info`.
list.label: Metrics
list.name: prometheus_datasource

list.description: Waiting to implement support of the optional value of `deployment.environment.name` in the OpenSearch and Jager panels, hide variable.
list.label: Environment
list.name: deployment_environment_name

title: APM Dashboard (Jaeger, Prometheus, OpenSearch)
